name: Seal The Eel
description:
Survive as long as possible while trying to seal as many enemies in with your tail, but hitting just one enemy will end the game. Use your tail as a shield to bounce enemies away from the head of the eel, just one hit is enough to be game over. Use your tail as a weapon by creating a seal, which will destroy any enemies within.

Mechanics -

-- Whenever you create a seal, every loop further up the tail will also be sealed.

-- For every enemy sealed at once, you will gain a combo bonus of 10 stacking points per enemy (10 extra points for one extra enemy, 10 + 20 points for two extras).

-- Red enemies will give you points when you seal them in.

-- Green (or spiked) enemies will remove points when you seal them in, and will always disappear after a few bounces.

--Anything touching the head of the eel will result in a game over.
